attributes.action: Stop afghan interpreters coming to UK
attributes.additional_details:
At worse case scenario they should be accommodated somewhere temporarily till its safe for them to return home,
Community race relations are already fragile across the country and alot of this is fueled by mass immigration this will further add fuel to hate, as UK tax payers we hope government will take appropriate steps.
attributes.background: Stop afghan interpreters coming to UK they need to be encouraged to stay put and develop thier own country, new afghan government has already declared that they have offered amnesty to all those who worked against them and they do not want people leaveing the country as it will create brain-drain.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Cancel the Afghan citizens’ resettlement scheme: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595224
